title: Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart, Steel Mesh Removable Sides, 3 cu ft, 400 lb Capacity, Green
descriptions:
**Introducing the Ultimate Gardening Companion - Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart**

Are you tired of lugging heavy gardening tools and supplies around your yard? Look no further. The Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart is here to revolutionize your gardening experience. With its robust steel mesh frame, this cart is built to last and can handle a massive 400-pound capacity, making it perfect for hauling heavy loads of soil, mulch, plants, and more.

**Key Features:**

* Durable steel mesh frame for added strength and durability
* Removable side panels for easy loading and unloading
* Convertible design allows you to switch to a flatbed cart in seconds
* 10-inch pneumatic tires provide a smooth ride and tight turn radius
* Ample ground clearance ensures easy maneuverability over rough terrain
* 4-wheel design for stability and balance
* Straight pull handle for comfortable and easy towing
* 1-year limited warranty for peace of mind

**Perfect for:**

* Gardening enthusiasts who need to haul heavy loads around their yard
* Landscapers who require a reliable and efficient cart for their daily tasks
* Homeowners who want to make yard work easier and more efficient

**Order Your Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart Today and Experience the Power of Convenient Gardening!**

Product Specifications:

* Frame Material: Steel mesh
* Capacity: 400 lbs / 3 cu ft
* Bed Dimensions: 34 inches x 18 inches
* Overall Height: 37 inches
* Weight: 36.6 pounds
* Color: Green

Don't wait - get your Gorilla Carts GOR400-COM Steel Garden Cart today and take your gardening game to the next level!
